PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dcterms: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>

DELETE
	{	?s dcat:accessURL ?o }
INSERT
	{ 	?s dcat:downloadURL ?o }
WHERE
	{ 	?s a dcat:Distribution .
		?s dcat:accessURL ?o .
		?s dcterms:format ?fmt .
		BIND (STR(?o) as ?url)
		FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?s dcat:downloadURL ?url }
		FILTER STRENDS(?url, ?file)
		VALUES ?file { "csv" "json" "kml" "xls" "xlsx" "zip" }
	}
